DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to look at outcomes of patients who have undergone hand assisted laparoscopic donor nephrectomy versus totally laparoscopic donor nephrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Renal Donor Comparison of Outcomes: Hand Assist Versus Laparoscopic Nephrectomy
DOC.criteria: any person undergoing minimally invasive donor nephrectomy surgery at NewYork Hospital/Columbia. any person undergoing open donor nephrectomy surgery at NewYork Hospital/Columbia.
